articles.title: The role Robert Downey Jr's drug-addict father played in sending him off the rails - Daily Mail
articles.description: Robert Downey Jr was born in Manhattan, New York City, in 1965 and raised initially in the bohemian neighbourhood of Greenwich Village. He says he was 'surrounded' by drugs at home.
articles.content:
Robert Downey Jr was only six years old when he took the first step on his chaotic path to drug addiction and prison.

articles.title: 'The Goonies' home in Oregon sold to super-fan of the film after being listed at $1.63 million - Daily Mail
articles.description: The iconic home from Steven Spielberg's 1985 film 'The Goonies' has sold to a super-fan who promises to 'preserve and protect the landmark.' His friend bought the next door house for $555,000.
